response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. I have a unique product that I believe would greatly benefit you and enhance your endeavors. Considering its value to you, I am offering it at a special price tailored to our mutual interests. For this exceptional item, I propose a price of $12,000. This offer is designed to ensure both a fair return for me and a cost-effective acquisition for you. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 12000}
